4.title: "Sargasso Slavery"
4.author: [No author]
4.series: Airboy) 15 p. in Airboy Comics, v. 7, no. 7
notes: SUMMARY: With Tex and Candy Calhoun, Airboy "lands" in the Sargasso Sea out of curiosity, and the three are enslaved by a ruling class that values ugliness over beauty.

33.heading: Calhoun, Tex.
33.title: "The Golden Planetoid"
33.author: [No author]
33.series: Airboy) 15 p. in Airboy Comics, v. 6, no. 8
notes: SUMMARY: In Tex Calhoun's private observatory, Airboy spots a small planet made of gold and platinum on a collision course with Earth. It falls into a dangerous stationary orbit over California, and criminals try to get the gold while Airboy tries to push it away from Earth.

34.heading: Calhoun, Tex.
34.title: "The Pearl"
34.author: [No author]
34.series: Airboy) 15 p. in Airboy Comics, v. 7, no. 11
notes: SUMMARY: Japanese pearl divers return the best pearl to the sea in thanks; years later Tex Calhoun's servant Yoshiwara wants to recover it to pay a gambling debt.
